title: Shinzo Abe, Japan's former prime minister, shot; condition unknown
content:
1. Shinzo Abe, Japan's former prime minister, shot; condition unknown  Reuters
  2. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe rushed to hospital after possible shooting, suspect arrested and charged with attempted murder, NHK reports  CNN
  3. Former Japan Prime Minister Abe Unconscious After Shooting, Reports Say  Bloomberg Politics
  4. U.S. 'saddened and shocked' by shooting of Japan's former premier Abe, envoy says  Reuters
  5. Former Japanese PM Shinzo Abe shot during speech in Nara  The Washington Post
contentSnippet:
Shinzo Abe, Japan's former prime minister, shot; condition unknown  Reuters
Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe rushed to hospital after possible shooting, suspect arrested and charged with attempted murder, NHK reports  CNN

Former Japanese PM Shinzo Abe shot during speech in Nara  The Washington Post

localize.title: 安倍晋三・元首相が銃撃される、容体不明
日本前首相安倍晋三遭枪击，情况不明
日本前首相安倍晉三遭槍擊，情況不明
